newsitem.title: USA: Sparta's program receives sixth patent.
newsitem.headline: Sparta's program receives sixth patent.

text.p: Sparta Pharmaceuticals Inc said Tuesday the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office granted a sixth patent on the University of Pennsylvania's recombinant serine protease inhibitor program.
The program may help to combat illnesses with uncontrollable inflammatory responses, such as cardiovascular disorders, stroke, lung inflammation and pancreatitis, the company said.
Sparta said the patent office granted the patent to the University of Pennsylvania, which is conducting the research on a Sparta grant.
It added the company has an exclusive license over the 60 compounds covered in the six U.S. patents issued to the university.
